ygData.subject: ARKNESS PRIME!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor breathed hard, holding her sword as steadily as she could. That fight with FireBlade had taken alot out of her, but as long as it was one less

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor breathed hard, holding her sword as steadily as she could.
That fight with FireBlade had taken alot out of her, but as long as it was 
one less enemy the Maximals had to be threatened with, who cared?
Suddenly her muscles tensed and she turned on her heel, the claws of her 
foot armor grinding into the ground.  Her scanners homed in on a streak of 
pink heading towards her, her mind numb at what was going on.
But nothing was controling her body this time, instead she felt a power 
pulsating from the very core of her spark.
The Matrix had come to life!
Power serged inside of her super structure, so much that it almost hurt.  
Her hands shook, then the rest of her body followed and she nearly dropped 
her sword.
And in one burst, silver flashed wings erupted from her back and stratched 
out behind her.
The last of the dieing sun caught a glint off of them as a red light began 
to pulse at the flat of her chest. The light began to get brighter, always 
pulsating with the beating of a single spark.
Though there was no helm, a face-plate detatched from neck armor and covered 
her mouth and nose.
And in one swipe of a swords blade, the turrent sent from Megatron bounced 
away and exploded behind her.*

" MEGATRON!!"

* With ice blue eyes she glared at him. And with a voice directed by the 
Matrix itself, she spoke.*

" I AM ARKNESS PRIME!"

* Gripping the sword with both hands she raised it above her her, the tip 
pulsating with a bright red light.*

" AND YOU WILL YEALD!!"

* Flipping the blade so that it pointed down, with a will of commanders 
before her it was stabbed into the ground. Streaks of light erupted from 
theblade and slithered along the ground like bolts of lightening from a 
thindercloud, cascading towards Magatron. But just before reaching him they 
shot into the air in straight bars of pure energy by the Matrix's will. 
Around Megatron them sprouted, growing and reaching for the sky...the gap at 
the brink...beginning to shrink and close.*
